title: Does morde ult make tentacles disappear?
body:
Cuz I didnt see him get slapped after he ulted me and I pressed R and W

EDIT

Yep morde ult basically disables all tentacles. What a stupid fucking way to have a matchup be a hard loss.

replies.body:
get qss and pull a "no u" on him.

it does cancel his ult and **should** give you your tentacles back.

unless he times it at exactly the right moment, while youre jumping upwards during your ult, in which case i dont know if it cancels the ult entirely. but thats really hard to do since mordes ult has a cast delay aswell. hed have to have godlike reflexes or press his ult button practically milliseconds before or after yours.
it shouldnt based on lore rip
It pulls you to an entirely different map layer.
it removes all outside help like malz minions, heimer turrets, teemo shrooms
